00032 class MmtkMd_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00033     '''mmtk test'''
00034     
00035     def setUp(self):
00036         """do argon"""
00037         argonConfiguration = file('argon.conf')
00038         lx, ly, lz = map(string.atof, string.split(argonConfiguration.readline()))
00039         self.samplesample = Sample()
00040         uc=UnitCell()
00041         uc.i.a=str(lx)+' 0.0 0.0'
00042         uc.i.b='0.0 '+str(ly)+' 0.0'
00043         uc.i.c='0.0 0.0 '+str(lz)
00044         unitCellBuilder=UnitCellBuilder()
00045         unitCellBuilder.i.unitCell=uc
00046         atoms = ''
00047         while 1:
00048             line = argonConfiguration.readline()
00049             if not line: break
00050             atoms+='Ar '+line
00051         unitCellBuilder.i.atoms = atoms
00052         self.samplesample.i.atomicStructure = unitCellBuilder
00053         self.samplesample.i.initialTemp = 300.0
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057     def testMmtkNVE(self):
00058         #amber = AmberForcefield()
00059         lennard = LennardJonesForcefield()
00060         md = Mmtk()
00061         md.i.sample = self.samplesample
00062         md.i.runType = 'md'
00063         md.i.forcefields = lennard
00064         md.i.ensemble = 'nve'
00065         md.i.timestep = 0.5
00066         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.005
00067         md.i.productionTime = 0.4
00068         md.integrate()
00069         #print md.getFinalConfiguration()
00070         
00071     def testMmtkNVT(self):
00072         lennard = LennardJonesForcefield()
00073         self.samplesample.i.temperature=200.0
00074         md = Mmtk()
00075         md.i.sample = self.samplesample
00076         md.i.runType = 'md'
00077         md.i.forcefields = lennard       
00078         md.i.ensemble = 'nvt'
00079         md.i.timestep = 0.5
00080         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.005
00081         md.i.productionTime = 0.01
00082         md.integrate()
00083         
00084     def testMmtkNPT(self):
00085         self.samplesample.i.temperature=300.0
00086         self.samplesample.i.pressure=1.0
00087         lennard = LennardJonesForcefield()
00088         md = Mmtk()
00089         md.i.sample = self.samplesample
00090         md.i.runType = 'md'
00091         md.i.forcefields = lennard  
00092         md.i.ensemble='npt'
00093         md.i.timestep=0.5
00094         md.i.equilibrationTime=0.005
00095         md.i.productionTime=0.01
00096         md.integrate()
00097   
00098 class MmtkRestart_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00099     
00100     def setUp(self):
00101         """do argon"""
00102         argonConfiguration = file('argon.conf')
00103         lx, ly, lz = map(string.atof, string.split(argonConfiguration.readline()))
00104         self.samplesample = Sample('periodic')
00105         self.samplesample.unitCell = [[lx, 0.0, 0.0], [0.0, ly, 0.0], [0.0, 0.0, lz]]
00106         atoms = []
00107         while 1:
00108             line = argonConfiguration.readline()
00109             if not line: break
00110             x, y, z = map(string.atof, string.split(line))
00111             atoms.append(['Ar', x, y, z])
00112         self.samplesample.atoms = atoms
00113         self.samplesample.initialTemp = 300.0
00114         self.samplesample.forcefields=[]
00115         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(['lennardJonesMmtk',12.0])
00116         
00117     def testRestart(self):
00118         # first do a short md run
00119         md = Mmtk(self.samplesample)
00120         md.i.ensemble = 'nve'
00121         md.i.timestep = 0.5
00122         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.005
00123         md.i.productionTime = 0.01
00124         md.i.trajectoryFilename='shortArgonNVE.nc'
00125         md.i.logFilename='shortArgonNVE.log'
00126         md.i.restartFilename='shortArgonRestartNVE.nc'
00127         md.integrate()
00128         # restart from it
00129         restartMd = Mmtk(self.samplesample)
00130         restartMd.i.restartFilename='shortArgonRestartNVE.nc'
00131         restartMd.i.logFilename='shortArgonNVE.log'
00132         restartMd.restartIntegrate()
00133   
00134 if __name__ == "__main__":
00135     suite1 = unittest.makeSuite(MmtkMd_TestCase)
00136     suite2 = unittest.makeSuite(MmtkRestart_TestCase)
00137     #alltests = unittest.TestSuite((suite1,suite2,suite3))
00138     alltests = unittest.TestSuite((suite1))
00139     unittest.TextTestRunner(verbosity=2).run(alltests)
